thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: John Shea

author: John Shea
title: John Shea
text: We asked for a Ford Explorer and it wasn't ready for us. He asked if we wanted a third seated car, we said no and he give us one anyway. We switched for something else and it was dirty on the outside and have had to put windshield cleaner in it right away. We signed up for Avis as we always do but got Budjet rent a car. Not happy having a car for three weeks that we don't care for. John Shea
